name: fly
body:
# fly

Natural language flight search from the command line

## Installation 

    brew install https://raw.github.com/evolve2k/fly/formula/fly.rb

## Usage

Flight search queries open your default browser and execute using the adioso.com flight search engine.

Try these Captain:

        $ fly to melbourne
        $ fly from adelaide to melbourne
        $ fly san fransisco late october
        $ fly bali in mid june
        $ fly somewhere warm
        $ fly anywhere friday afternoon
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
